Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predict a close game between the Kansas City Royals and Cleveland Guardians due to their identical records of 75-58.
The game is scheduled for Wednesday, August 28, 2024, at 1:10 PM ET at Progressive Field.
Michael Wacha, starting pitcher for the Royals, has an ERA of 3.32 and WHIP of 1.2 through 133 innings pitched this season.
Tanner Bibee, starting pitcher for the Guardians, has an ERA of 3.46 and WHIP of 1.1 with 150 strikeouts in 138 innings.
Betting odds lean slightly towards the Guardians as the favorites at home despite their recent form.
The total set at 8 runs suggests anticipation of a high-scoring game.
